short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome Extension that shows Prophet Muhamed's Hadith once a tab is opened

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your browsing experience with the 'Hadith Tab' extension! Access a daily inspirational Hadith (saying) of Prophet Muhammad (peace be upon him) directly in your new tab. Enjoy a peaceful background image that changes daily, complementing your spiritual journey. Stay connected to your faith with accurate prayer times based on your location.
